instructions: In a bowl, combine the first seven ingredients.
Crumble turkey over mixture and mix just until combined.
Cook in a nonstick skillet coated with nonstick cooking spray until no longer pink.
title: Asian Turkey Burgers
steps: In a bowl, combine the first seven ingredients. Crumble turkey over mixture and mix just until combined. Shape into four patties. Cook in a nonstick skillet coated with nonstick cooking spray until no longer pink.
